mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT notice_no, notice_title, LAG(notice_title) over (ORDER BY notice_title) AS beforeNotice, LAG(notice_no) over (ORDER BY notice_title) AS beforeNo, LEAD(notice_title) over (ORDER BY notice_title) AS afterNotice, LEAD(notice_no) over (ORDER BY notice_title) AS afterNo FROM notice) a WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no}
